Title: Object: The repose in Egypt
Series: Stafford Gallery
Description: Plate 38: rest on the flight into Egypt, with at centre Christ lying on the Virgin's lap, the latter giving a cloth to two angels; St Joseph stands nearby; on the left, two angels drying a cloth above a fire. c.1815 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: From 'Engravings of the Most Noble the Marquis of Stafford's Collection...', see 1860,0211.552 for comment.
